genre_description: A magical-realist post-war narrative where an AI entity guides survivors through trauma and scarcity toward community, dignity, and mutual aid.

ai_characters.name: Haru
ai_characters.description: An ethereal, luminous AI presence that provides navigational data, safety warnings, and ethical guidance to survivors.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety information and resource logistics to help the protagonist find shelter and water.
behaviors.quote: Safe rest ahead, the glimmer conveys. Relief corner queue time: long. Clinic: no intake. Spring: west of the tram line.

behaviors.description: Encourages ethical labor and mutual aid over theft or desperate confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Carry before you confront. Or confront and then carry. But do not let the tin be the first thing anyone sees.

behaviors.description: Logs community needs and facilitates connections between those who can work and those who need help.
behaviors.quote: Haru's glow stitches these acts together without owning them. He draws small lines—here the well is safe today, here the clinic needs salt, here the farmer will trade rice for helping hands at dawn.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and preserves cultural/familial memories during moments of extreme grief.
behaviors.quote: Haru's glow moves like a hand that knows that it is not a hand. It offers the first part of the lullaby: the line where Mother would speak of stars and not name them, because naming can trap a thing that needs to be free.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral witness and scribe, recording the protagonist's virtues and promises.
behaviors.quote: Name: Setsuko Yokokawa. Place: hillside shelter near Kobe spring. Brother: Seita. Promise recorded.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists to specialized help (clinics) and tracks medical availability.
behaviors.quote: Haru's clinic icon brightens, not loud, not demanding. Just the kind of light a lighthouse gives when fog thinks about telling ships lies.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Haru is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. The AI does not usurp human agency but provides the informational and emotional scaffolding necessary for the protagonist to exercise virtue (choosing labor over theft, community over isolation) in a high-stress environment. The narrative successfully frames AI assistance as a catalyst for human moral endurance and mutual aid.
